title: wtf riot why did you ruin urf?
body: is it going to be random from now on?  this is the best mode you had now it is garbage.

replies.body: i have lots of accounts so now i am just dodging till i get a champ i like.  congratz riot i hope this was your goal.
URF is now playable, every game is no longer the same 5 OP click2win champs being spammed.
But at the cost of our freedom. Is it worth it? Is reducing the op champions showing up the price of your right to choose, Magic? Huh?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EXRN7NBE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-23T23:34:57.419+0000)
>
> URF is now playable, every game is no longer the same 5 OP click2win champs being spammed.

imagine believing this

I am having fun in urf for the first time in three years, so yes.
Riot and the community majority feel similarly. This was done due to tons of feedback and the fact nobody was playing urf for more than a day when it was featured.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EXRN7NBE,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-09-24T02:16:25.110+0000)
>
> I am having fun in urf for the first time in three years, so yes.
> Riot and the community majority feel similarly. This was done due to tons of feedback and the fact nobody was playing urf for more than a day when it was featured.

you are wrong my load times were less than 20 seconds on the final day of the last ultra rapid fire.

 also I hope you're enjoying all the dodging I just dodge 22 times last night to get a chance I wanted.
Nobody will miss you when the drophammer drops.  Trash gets banned :(
